subject: Re: Frank's Box /A&E is requesting Frank's personal attention:
author: psi_research
full_text:
Ryan,
Thanks for returning Dave's call today. Your message was communicated
to Frank and he realizes that it wasn't the intention of A&E to
deliberately post inaccurate info and that PRS is separate from the
network. I believe he considers the issue to be closed.  Regards, Bill

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Regan" <haunt.seeker@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks for bringing this to our attention. I wasn't even aware that 
> this episode was airing next week. You all have to understand that A&E 
> and PRS are TWO SEPARATE entities. We do everything in our power to 
> maintain accuracy. This has been brought to my attention from someone 
> else and I am awaiting Mr. Sumption to contact me. 
> --------------------
> 
> Ryan Buell
> -Director/Founder of Penn State PRS
> "To Trust, Honor, and Always Seek the Truth."
> 
> "Questions, comments, concerns, harassments?"
> Email: ryanb@...
>
